properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ry zanak'Andriamanitra,
Injany misy feo,
Dia feo avy any an-danitra
Ka moa ve renareo ?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Jesosy dia ho avy,
Tsy ho ela intsony izao.
Miantso, miangavy :
Mahareta ianareo
Man√†na finoana
Mivavaha izao.
Ny tany dia ho foana,
Ho simba sy ho lao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Injao ny tabataban'ady
Sy loza be manjo
No indro fa mianjady
Ka reraka ny fo.
Jesosy dia ho avy, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ny fitiavan-tena be,
Ny ditra maro koa,
Ny olona ho lozabe
Famantarana avokoa.
Jesosy dia ho avy, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Koa dia mandrosoa sakaiza
hamita ny adidy.
Mijoroa ka meteza
Ho olom-boafidy.
Jesosy dia ho avy,sns.
